setup_steps.description: Deploy the application to Vercel using the vercel.json configuration
In Vercel dashboard, go to Settings > Domains and add suggestlyg4plus.io
Add the provided DNS records to your domain registrar
Wait for DNS propagation and verify domain is working
Test all features including search functionality

troubleshooting.401_error: Domain not properly configured in Vercel
troubleshooting.404_error: Application not deployed or routing issues
